headline: 'We caught them': Trump hypes 'explosive' 2020 election litigation in Michigan
author: Daniel Chaitin
sentences: Trump spoke for roughly five minutes during a telephone town hall event for Matthew DePerno, a Republican candidate for Michigan attorney general who is spearheading the litigation, according to the Detroit News.
Former President Donald Trump touted the "explosive" 2020 election fraud lawsuit in Antrim County, Michigan, in a campaign call on Wednesday.
And they said, 'Well, we made a little mistake.'

Comments:
It feels like I've heard this before.
"The mistake had to be corrected," Trump said.
It wasn't a mistake at all.
